## 1.Clean data


### 1.1 Kembel and Cahill jr., 2011
```{r clean data}

kembel <- read_csv("data/raw/Kembel et al. 2011/community.traits.csv") %>%
  rename(Plot_code = plot, Name = species, LA = LeafArea) %>%
  mutate(Name = str_replace_all(Name, "_", " ")) %>%
  mutate(Name = recode(Name, "Petalostemon purpureum" = "Dalea purpurea"))
	
kembel_veg <- kembel %>%
  select(c(Plot_code, Name, abund)) %>%
  pivot_wider(values_from = abund, names_from = Name) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = 2:ncol(.), values_to = "cover", names_to = "Name")

kembel_species_list <- colnames(kembel_veg)

kembel_trait <- kembel %>%
  select(-c(abund)) %>%
  full_join(kembel_veg) %>%
  group_by(Name) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~replace_na(., mean(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
  select(-c(cover)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(order(colnames(.))) %>%
  relocate(Plot_code, Name) %>%
  arrange(Name) 

kembel_trait_fd <- kembel_trait

kembel_trait <- kembel_trait %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ c(scale(., center = F)))) 
  

kembel_veg <- kembel_veg %>%
  pivot_wider(values_from = cover, names_from = Name) %>%
  column_to_rownames(var = "Plot_code") %>%
  select(order(colnames(.)))


traitlist <- sort(c( "LA", "LeafThickness", "LeafTissueDens", "RootDiam", "RootTissueDens",
                     "SLA", "SRL"))
cwm_names <- paste0(traitlist, "_cwm")
cwv_names <- paste0(traitlist, "_cwv")

trait_information <- lst(traitlist, cwm_names, cwv_names)


``` 


## 5. Perform calculations
```{r calculations }

kembel_processed_specieslvl <- cats_preparation(input_veg = kembel_veg, input_trait = kembel_trait, cutoff_value =  0.8, trait_information = trait_information, trait_detail = "Plot")

mean_dist <- calculate_mean_dist(kembel_veg, kembel_processed_specieslvl)

FD_df <- calculate_FD_plotlvl(kembel_processed_specieslvl, kembel_veg, kembel_trait_fd)

diversity_info <- kembel_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]] %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(shannon = diversity(.[,1:ncol(.)], index = "shannon", MARGIN = 1, base = exp(1)),
         simpson = diversity(.[,1:ncol(.)], index = "simpson", MARGIN = 1, base =exp(1)),
         species_richness = specnumber(.[,1:ncol(.)], MARGIN = 1),
         empty_states = ncol(kembel_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]]) - species_richness,
         meta_size = ncol(kembel_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]])) %>%
  select(shannon, simpson, species_richness, empty_states, meta_size) %>% # base = exp(1) gives the shannon index a log e base
  rownames_to_column(var = "Plot_code") %>%
  full_join(mean_dist) %>%
  full_join(FD_df)


```



## 6. Cats model
```{r cats calculations}

kembel_cats <- cats_calculations(kembel_processed_specieslvl, trait_information,
                            trait_detail = "Plot") %>%
  mutate(study = "Kembel")


kembel_figure <- cats_visualisation(kembel_cats) %>%
  mutate(study = "Kembel")

save(kembel_processed_specieslvl, kembel_figure, kembel_species_list, kembel_cats,
  file = "data/processed/kembel_calculations.RData")

ggplot(kembel_figure, aes(x = species_richness, y = KLR2)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Deviance) + 
  theme_classic() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  labs(title = "The relationship between species richness and the CATS decomposition - Kembel and Cahill jr., 2011",
       x = "Species richness") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = 2) +
   coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-0.2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(-0.2, 0,0.2, 0.4, 
    0.6,  0.8,  1
  )) 

ggplot(kembel_figure, aes(x = mean_dist, y = KLR2)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Deviance) + 
  theme_classic() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  labs(title = "The relationship between plot dissimilarity and the CATS decomposition - Kembel and Cahill jr., 2011",  
       x = "Average Bray-Curtis index value") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = 2) +
   coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-0.2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(-0.2, 0,0.2, 0.4, 
    0.6,  0.8,  1
  )) 



```
